definition: to settle a claim/claims settlement/payment of claims
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
to compensate for loss/to indemnify/to suffer a financial loss

sentences.english: AHello, this is the claims service department of SW insurance company. SW.
sentences.chinese: 您好，這裏是保險公司理賠部。

sentences.english: Some liabilities will, however, have been reinsured through the London market.
sentences.chinese: 但一些理賠責任已通過倫敦市場進行了再保險。

sentences.english: The coating could spell an end to a huge number of insurance claims.
sentences.chinese: 這種塗料可以終止鉅額的手機保險理賠。
最後，楊燕拿到了保險理賠金。

sentences.english: The company hired to handle compensation and demolition also declined to answer questions.
sentences.chinese: 被僱傭來從事理賠與拆遷的公司也拒絕回答任何問題。

sentences.english: Our Hospital will help the card-holders to complete the complex claim process.
sentences.chinese: 本院會協助持卡人完成繁瑣的理賠程序。

definition: life insurance/abbr. for 人壽保險|人寿保险
